detail_desc: Wide, off-the-shoulder blouse in a crinkled weave with smocking and a small frill trim at the top and wide, 3/4-length trumpet sleeves.
Wide, off-the-shoulder blouse in a crinkled weave with smocking and a small frill trim at the top and wide, 3/4-length trumpet sleeves.
Suede boots with an ankle-height shaft, an adjustable tab with a metal buckle at one side, a loop at the back and a welt seam around the soles. Faux fur linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Boots in grained leather with an ankle-height shaft, lacing at the front, a zip in one side and a loop at the back. Patterned fabric linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Metal hoop earrings, one pair with a pattern. Diameter 2 cm and 3 cm.
Blouse in an airy weave with a V-neck, covered buttons down the front, short dolman sleeves and a tie detail at the hem.
Blouse in an airy weave with a V-neck, covered buttons down the front, short dolman sleeves and a tie detail at the hem.
Blouse in an airy weave with a V-neck, covered buttons down the front, short dolman sleeves and a tie detail at the hem.
Metal earrings with faceted sparkly stones at the top and a rectangular plastic pendant at the bottom. Length 7 cm.
Straight-cut blouse in an airy patterned viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front and cap sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Three-strand necklace made of different thicknesses of metal chains. One of the chains has a faux fur-covered leopard-print pendant. Adjustable length, 40-48 cm.
CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Three rings in recycled silver with decorative gemstones. The rings are in various designs and sizes.
Leather Chelsea boots with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the top. Twill linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops. The cotton content of the socks is organic.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops. The cotton content of the socks is organic.

Sunhat in a patterned cotton weave with ears on top and ties under the chin. Cotton lining.
Small shoulder bag in braided water hyacinth with imitation leather details. Flap with a concealed magnetic fastener and a narrow shoulder strap. Lined. Size 7x16x19 cm.
Trainers in jersey with imitation leather sections, elasticated lacing and a tongue with an appliqué on the front. Padded edge and a grosgrain loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles.
Short shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Pool shoes in printed imitation leather with moulded soles that are fluted underneath.
Derby shoes in imitation leather with lacing at the front and a welt seam around the soles. Canvas linings and insoles. Heel 2 cm.
Chelsea boots in imitation leather with elastic gores in the sides and loops at the top. Fleece linings and insoles and chunky soles with a low heel.
Chelsea boots in imitation leather with elastic gores in the sides and loops at the top. Fleece linings and insoles and chunky soles with a low heel.

Boots in imitation leather with an ankle-height shaft with a visible felted lining at the top and lacing at the front. Zip in one side, a loop at the back and a decorative welt seam around the soles. Felted linings and insoles and chunky soles.

Boots in imitation leather with an ankle-height shaft with a visible felted lining at the top and lacing at the front. Zip in one side, a loop at the back and a decorative welt seam around the soles. Felted linings and insoles and chunky soles.
Satin top with embroidery at the top and adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps.
Satin top with embroidery at the top and adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps.

Sleeveless, one-shoulder body in double-layered jersey with a single shoulder strap with a knot at the top. Seam at the hips. a microfibre lower section and a lined gusset with a press-stud fastening.
A-line dress in patterned lightweight sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves and a detachable braided imitation suede belt.
A-line dress in patterned lightweight sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves and a detachable braided imitation suede belt.
Dress in a cotton weave with a collar, button placket and long sleeves with a tab and button. Pockets in the side seams, a detachable imitation suede belt and a rounded hem.
Dress in a cotton weave with a collar, button placket and long sleeves with a tab and button. Pockets in the side seams, a detachable imitation suede belt and a rounded hem.
Dress in a cotton weave with a collar, button placket and long sleeves with a tab and button. Pockets in the side seams, a detachable imitation suede belt and a rounded hem.

Body in lace and mesh with mesh-lined, triangular cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide light support. Adjustable shoulder straps, an adjustable horizontal strap at the back and no fasteners. Lined gusset and high cut at the back.

Top and pair of trousers in organic cotton. Top in soft jersey with buttons at the top. Trousers in narrow-wale corduroy with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist, a fake fly, leg pocket with a decorative button, and elasticated hems.
T-shirt in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a round neckline and short sleeves.
T-shirt in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a round neckline and short sleeves.

Pyjamas with a vest top and shorts in soft cotton jersey. Vest top with contrasting colour ribbing around the neckline and armholes and an open chest pocket. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Fitted vest top in soft jersey.
Ankle-length trousers in soft cotton twill with a high waist, hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Belt with a metal buckle, side pockets, back pockets and skinny legs.

Bag in woven fabric with a two-way zip at the top and a detachable, adjustable shoulder strap with a metal buckle and carabiner hook. One zipped mesh outer compartment and two mesh inner compartments. Lined. Size 22x29 cm.

Bag in woven fabric with a two-way zip at the top and a detachable, adjustable shoulder strap with a metal buckle and carabiner hook. One zipped mesh outer compartment and two mesh inner compartments. Lined. Size 22x29 cm.
Reversible fisherman’s hat with one patterned side and the other side in a solid colour. Width of brim approx. 5 cm.

Jacket in washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and welt side pockets. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and an adjustable tab and buttons at the sides.
Short dress in soft jersey with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Knee socks in a soft fine-knit.
Knee socks knitted in chenille with elasticated tops.
Set in soft organic cotton jersey. Patterned top with short butterfly sleeves and a concealed press-stud on the shoulders. Puff pants with elastication at the waist and hems.

Socks in a soft jacquard knit containing some wool.

Off-the-shoulder dress in an airy, patterned viscose weave with elastication and a wide, scalloped flounce at the top. Elasticated seam at the waist and an asymmetric, wrapover skirt with a flounced trim. Unlined.
